Banner.title:
Fundraisers
Transparency
Smart Contract
Banner.description:
Global charity connection
with Blockchain technology.*
Banner.suggest:
Get started in just a few minutes — With transparent blockchain technology,
you can easily create a campaign, share meaningful stories,
and connect strongly with the community to spread kindness to everyone.

Guide.title:
Fundraising with blockchain is easy,
secure, and transparent

step1.title: Use our tools to create your fundraiser
step1.description: Our simple interface guides you to set up your fundraiser, define your goal, and make updates anytime, all with the transparency of blockchain.

step2.title: Reach donors by sharing
step2.description: Share your fundraiser link and leverage the power of blockchain to engage donors, ensuring every contribution is securely tracked and transparent.

step3.title: Securely receive donations
step3.description: Add your wallet information or invite your beneficiary to do the same. Blockchain ensures that every donation is securely processed and recorded.
